code: import{REGISTER_SUCCESS,USER_LOADED,AUTH_ERROR,LOGIN_SUCCESS,LOGOUT,ACCOUNT_DELETED}from'../actions/types';const initialState={token:localStorage.getItem('token'),isAuthenticated:null,loading:true,user:null};const authReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;const{type,payload}=action;switch(type){case USER_LOADED:return{...state,isAuthenticated:true,loading:false,user:payload};case REGISTER_SUCCESS:case LOGIN_SUCCESS:return{...state,...payload,isAuthenticated:true,loading:false};case AUTH_ERROR:case LOGOUT:case ACCOUNT_DELETED:return{...state,token:null,isAuthenticated:false,loading:false,user:null};default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
